sense.name: effort
sense.examples: He had difficulty walking. She finished the test with great difficulty.

sense.name: troubles
sense.commentary: DIFFICULTY[+event] a factor causing trouble in achieving a positive result or tending to produce a negative result
sense.examples: Serious difficulties were encountered in obtaining a pure reagent. Their financial difficulties lasted six months. Those difficulties could've been prevented with proper preparations. The car accident, the house fire, and his broken foot were just three of the difficulties he attributed to his superstitions.

sense.name: difficultness
sense.examples: They agreed about the difficulty of the climb.
